Document test plans and acceptance criteria using Rally or similar life cycle management tools.     Develop test scripts and perform automated and manual exploratory testing to ensure software meets business and security requirements and established best practices. Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent work experience.
